approaches.title: Sequence Slicing
approaches.blurb: Use a slice with a negative step to reverse the string.

approaches.title: Iteration and Concatenation
approaches.blurb: Iterate through the codepoints and concatenate them to a new string.

approaches.title: Backward iteration with Range
approaches.blurb: Use a negative step with range() to iterate backward and append to a new string.

approaches.title: Make a list and use join()
approaches.blurb: Create a list from the string and use join to make a new string.

approaches.title: Use the built-in list.reverse() function.
approaches.blurb: Create a list of codepoints, use list.reverse() to reverse in place, and join() to make a new string.

approaches.title: Use the built-in reversed() function.
approaches.blurb: Use reversed() and unpack it with join() to make a new string.

approaches.title: Additional approaches that are further afield
